website_summaries.verdict: Made with pharmaceutical grade ingredients, this formula helps remove stubborn mats from many dogs' coats. And it comes in a noiseless spray bottle to keep your pup calm.
pros: Made from natural, pharmaceutical grade ingredients
Helps to get matting out of hair
Temporarily helps with many skin irritations
Helps to cut down on smells
cons: Do not spray near the eyes
Relieves itching only for very short periods

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have two big dogs and these were the largest bottles amazon had available. Since we’re in the middle of COVID the groomers are closed as they’re not considered an essential service. The smell wasn’t very pleasing to my nose and it took quite a lot of spraying (& the spraying mechanism was messy) to make it lather. I’m going to try the mango one and pray it’s better.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetie

customer_reviews.title: The spray is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs is at least 13 years old and suffers from arthritis and spondylosis. Since he is unable to walk upstairs to the bathroom for a bath, I needed an alternative to bathe him. After researching on Amazon and based on the reviews, I purchased this spray. The spray is very easy to use, my boy didn't mind it at all. I was able to clean him quickly - his coat is shiny soft and I live the smell (which lasts for days). I'm so happy I found this spray and to be able to clean my senior boy without risking him being injured in carrying him upstairs and into the bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Looks industrial, but it's all natural!
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the package turn you away, the ingredients are great. Tea-tree based, loads of botanicals, waterless. I've had great success with soothing dry skin with this shampoo. Smells good, quiet spray, cleans really well. Leaves coats smooth and soft, no sticky residue. I use on short-haired dogs.
customer_reviews.author: ChaiMacaron

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have Grooming Product For Your Faithful Canine Companions
customer_reviews.text: In the past I was always skeptical about waterless shampoos. However, after learning about Miracle Coat Spray On Waterless Dog Shampoo and its natural ingredients, I decided to give it a try. Result? Amazing! My Chow-American Eskimo mix Lexi has a very thick double coat with layers upon layers of fine long hair. She was very comfortable as I spritzed on the waterless shampoo, rubbed it into her coat, and toweled it off. Her damp coat brushed easily with no matting; quickly dried into a clean, lush, soft, and fresh smelling coat. Lexi truly looks as if she had a "regular" water bath. A must have grooming product I will never be without.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any dog owner
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders on dirty paws after walks! I have a white Maltipoo puppy who loves to roll around in anything that smells "good" to her. While this is mostly grass (probably enhanced with urine from other dogs), her paws especially get dirty after each walk. Since I don't want her looking like a dirty mutt and I don't think either of us could handle a bath a day, this product is a welcome addition to our grooming routine. This can be used by itself with a towel to wipe dry but I found works best if you take a small container and dip and swirl the paws after spraying liberally, rubbing in and letting sit for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: S Waugh

customer_reviews.title: Sticky-Not Clean-Doggie!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t clean my dog, and left a sticky residue. Instructions said to wet the coat and massage into a lather, then towel off. I did all that, but was left with a sticky, miserable dog. I had to give him a proper bath immediately. I had hoped this waterless shampoo would work as an in-between, as my dog is large and not easy to bathe. I’m disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrchuck2000

customer_reviews.title: good for occasional touch ups
customer_reviews.text: It may be great for dogs with a thinner coat. Lab/Chow mix has such a full coat it took almost half a bottle to do the job. It does leave a clean scent tho. Can't expect it to work as good as a full bath but is good in a pinch like when he comes inside from a rainy trip outside. Mainly use it on his feet and belly on those days. Wasn't crazy about the idea of it foaming as much as it did. Was concerned it was too much like a shampoo as far as spraying on and using a towel to dry off. Wondering about it leaving too much residue so I don't use it often.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Ewww, that smell...
customer_reviews.text: That smell, like a chemical perm. I was surprised after reading ingredients and reviews to find such a terrible smell. Definitely not medow fresh. The smell doent last very long, few hours at most. I honestly didn't notice a huge difference as far as cleanliness. So surprised at the great ratings. I gave it 2 stars for ease of use and shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Smom

customer_reviews.title: Costly Mistake
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my Sheltie.....he wound up gooey and I had to take him to the groomer for a total wet water shampoo to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful. . .
customer_reviews.text: Miracle Coat Spray - no tub, no attempted escapes from the tub, no water shaken all over the bathroom and me. Soggy towels everywhere? Not so much. I'm in my 80s and it's been difficult to coax and/or just toss a pug or the basset into the tub for a good scrub. This spray won't take the place of a bath, but there won't be so many struggles now that a waterless/rinseless shampoo is available for in-between scrubs.Some have commented about not liking the smell but I think that's one of Miracle Coats charms.
customer_reviews.author: Clarity Driven

customer_reviews.title: Good product but could use a better scent...
customer_reviews.text: This product does the job of removing that doggy order my pups get when they go outside to do their business and to play. I love the spray bottle and the big size. But I don't much care for the smell...
customer_reviews.author: Awilda

customer_reviews.title: For a dog with white hair that looks yellow when he's had his fun at the dog park
customer_reviews.text: My pup hates being sprayed, with anything. But, I can't get enough of this stuff. For a dog with white hair that looks yellow when he's had his fun at the dog park ... I just spray him down and towel him off. The towel ends up covered in dirt and he is left clean and smells great. You have to use a lot to really get them clean, so best to buy in bulk if you're dog is big. I just love this whole Miracle Coat line.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: this is great
customer_reviews.text: love it---the dog comes home after a walk and he smells bad...so I spray this on him and rub him off with a towel...he loves it--great for when company is coming over and we don't have time to give him a bath...we can just spray and towel quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for in between grooming appointments
customer_reviews.text: Love to use this on my dog in between grooming appointments. Smell is fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Gpc

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my dog kinda, well with a coating?
customer_reviews.text: It's kinda weird, she doesn't stink as bad as usual, but when you pet her she's a bit....sticky? I sprayed, wiped and wiped some more scrubbing her down in hopes that the smell would be offset as she is a large stinky dog that cannot get into the tub due to age and arthritis. So I shall maybe try spraying, then a wet washcloth, then dry toweling? I am just not sure this performs the way it's advertised to perform.
customer_reviews.author: Kilde: it's like "tilde" with a K.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an interim "wash" for my German Shepherd dog, who does not like water. It isn't really a thorough cleaning, but it works very well between Merlin's very infrequent baths. Brush the dog first - then spray it on liberally, work it into the coat a little, and you'll see a limited amount of foaming. Leave it in, or (better, in my opinion) towel off the dog thoroughly. The odor is not unpleasant, and the dogs don't seem to mind it. I'll use this repeatedly. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Miracle leave In Shampoo Kept Me out of the Dog House.
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually buy this, but I was taking care of my dogs plus my mom's Yorkie. As I ran out of the house, to take her baby to visit her at rehab after surgery; I remembered to use this product on her baby's hair. I walked in and one of the other ladies commented on how well he looked since I washed him. I just smiled.....
customer_reviews.author: Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for a long time and like how well it works. Great for in between baths.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Helps me keep my dogs smelling clean ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Helps me keep my dogs smelling clean in between baths. I try not to bathe my dogs too often since it strips the oils from their coats and this is the perfect product to keep them looking and smelling good in the meantime. I also use this a couple of days before I have a show and use other products the day off the show. Great stuff!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dejan Vrban

customer_reviews.title: Yay
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and leaves pups hair soft. It's super easy to use too. Nice when I don't want the drama of giving her a real bath.
customer_reviews.author: SMU

customer_reviews.title: Should be 4 1/2 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I needed something easy to remove poison ivy from my dogs as they come in daily (actually hourly - in and out....) I am very allergic, so I am constantly wiping them down. I don't do a 'soaking' with this. If you have to soak them, you might as well give them bath. But it works very well as an alternative option. It helps me very well.
customer_reviews.author: grtgrn

customer_reviews.title: Got a Digger? You Need This Shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Miracle Coat waterless shampoo for years, and love it. Especially in the spring, our dogs sometimes dig in the Georgia clay, so occasionally need a "leg bath" before they can come back in the house. With this shampoo and a towel, they're clean and sweet-smelling in no time. This really is a wonderful product for anyone who owns dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy W.

customer_reviews.title: Soft fur/smells good
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. My dog gets dirty and I dont want to over wash and dry his skin out. This is a great way to kind of clean his fur. And it smells good. Makes his fur soft and healthy looking.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey D

customer_reviews.title: Good for quick clean ups!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog often is muddy after our morning walks and this product works well for quick clean ups. It's nice to rub her down with a wet cloth and this shampoo and not have to soak her to get the soap out. I've been using it for a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Works in a pinch!
customer_reviews.text: Our 90lb lab had been hit by a car and had to be moved inside with a broken leg. We were unable to get his incision wet nor were we comfortable putting him in the tub. This Shampoo did help him smell better. It only lasted for a couple of days but it was easy to use. I could give him bath in about 5 minutes whereever he was standing or laying in the house.
customer_reviews.author: judkins

customer_reviews.title: I really like this Shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I am a volunteer foster Mom for rescue dogs and I can tell you that this stuff is wonderful for a quick clean up when you don't have time for a full bath. My own pups love to play with my fosters so their coats get very stinky from all of the mouth play. This product does an excellent job of cleaning their coat vs. just masking the smell. It smells great without smelling like a heavy perfume. I highly recommend this to all dog owners!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dirty paws best friend!
customer_reviews.text: This product saves me so much time. Early mornings are always cool and damp. Muddy feet (2 Standard Poodles) can make a mess in a minute! Have trained them to stop at the kitchen threshold and wait for me to spray and wipe their feet. No more daily mopping of muddy footprints!
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Blyss

customer_reviews.title: I finally found a deodorizer that works on my 3 stinky dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasant light smell and it leaves their fur soft shiny and clean looking. Good price compared to local stores that sell similar products that don't work as well. I ordered the gallon refill. It doesn't bother my dogs, some products make them sneeze.
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Waterless Dog Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed! Our retriever likes to go out and roll in smelly things and we can't afford to take her to the groomer once a week, plus I have a bad back so conventional baths aren't fun for me at all! Bought this on a whim and it actually works!
customer_reviews.author: RDR

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo for dogs I've found
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive when I first ordered this but after using it just once, I really love it. It smells great but not overly fragrant. It makes my dogs coat soft and shiny. I would recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: steelchick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems to work but the scent does not last more than a few hours
customer_reviews.author: ISALY911

customer_reviews.title: ill give it a three as it didn't leave a ...
customer_reviews.text: ill give it a three as it didn't leave a residue but didn't think it cleaned that well, and you have to saturate which defeats the purpose of a waterless shampoo when your dog is soaking wet
customer_reviews.author: deanne oldham-mcnabb

customer_reviews.title: Good daily solution for stinky dogs
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff! Every time we take our dog to the dog park we spritz him off with this stuff, scrub and towel him dry. It is not a dry shampoo! You must wet the dog and use your fingers to scrub then towel off, but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Seaside Designer

customer_reviews.title: Worked fairly well for my old Rottweiler who hates water ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked fairly well for my old Rottweiler who hates water! The sprayer broke with in the 3 squeeze of the handle that’s why I’m not giving full stars
customer_reviews.author: Paxton Scruggs

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 dogs and we get alot of mud in the spring and fall and I keep a bottle of this and some old towels next to my back door to wipe down muddy dogs before they come in. It's got a nice, refreshing scent and has never irritated my dogs' skin.
customer_reviews.author: CareyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This did not work will with my dog begs because ...
customer_reviews.text: This did not work will with my dog begs because of his longer coat . I think it would work will on short hair dogs .​
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great between bath times, does not hurt the dogs skin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a miracle coat. Dog's hair felt oily
customer_reviews.text: My recently adopted dog was extremely traumatized by bath or anything related to water (for unknown reason, there's no history on the dog prior to adoption) so I had no choice but to use waterless shampoo all the time. Amazon's reviews on this seemed good so I got this one as a first choice but I'm not sure I'm happy with the result. After spraying my dog (he was still frightened but not enough to bite me) and drying with paper towels, his hair started feeling very oily. It wasn't a clean feeling and the smell isn't that great. Maybe it worked better for certain hair but not for my short-haired dog. I'll continue looking for better waterless shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Betts

customer_reviews.title: ... smell Not to be desired and this stuff is wonderful it smells great and she doesn't have an issue ...
customer_reviews.text: My newfoundland puppy is huge and she loves to be outside but she comes in with an smell Not to be desired and this stuff is wonderful it smells great and she doesn't have an issue having it sprayed on !!! Even between visit for her grommet!!!
customer_reviews.author: OneFace

customer_reviews.title: A runners dream!
customer_reviews.text: A copy from the conditioner but truly the same feeling: I love the scent and having a product in the house that I can just spray on my pooch without having to give a bath. Perfect for pooches that are very active!
customer_reviews.author: Two Cents

customer_reviews.title: OK but not fond of the aroma...
customer_reviews.text: This product does help clean up your dog between baths but I can't stand the smell. Since thats a very personal thing you may not have the same issue. However I would suggest trying out the smallest size possible first to see how you feel about it.
customer_reviews.author: onederin

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this stuff for years as a last minute final touch before going into the ring with my show dogs. It puts a nice sheen on their coat, doesn't leave a greasy film, smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: & excellent deodorizer. Will order again & keep using
customer_reviews.text: Wow, does this work well! We have a Shiloh & it's a real pain to actually give him a bath. Major undertaking!! This product gave him a soft coat, & excellent deodorizer. Will order again & keep using.
customer_reviews.author: bhcole

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Spray on a few squirts, rub it into the dogs coat and remove with a paper towel. Dog smells like New! My dog has short hair, not sure how it would work for long haired dogs
customer_reviews.author: Bluesman

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: nice stuff but I bought it to clean a english mastiff and to a certain point u have to still get dog wet and wipe off-what I wanted was a spray on & wipe off with a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This ia awesome stuff, perfect for ny Bernese Mountain dog, she always smells a little stinky after she's outside playing, so I give her a quick bath with this about once a week!
customer_reviews.author: Alley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my wheaten between grooming!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other waterless shampoos, but this one worked the best! My wheatens coat matts up when it's dirty, This waterless shampoo made his coat feel soft and silky again! Perfect to use between groomings.
customer_reviews.author: PattiS

customer_reviews.title: A must have for winter months, or just to spot-clean between baths.
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it and it really does clean and dry nicely. I mainly use it on Aussie Shephard to clean her backside..things tend to get caught in all that hair back there. She loves the stuff and it really makes her hair smell nice. Its a perfect solution to keeping your dog clean during the long winter months, too. Even though you really don't need water to use, I still take a wet cloth and dampen their coats first - seems to help reduce the amount needed to really get a good lather going. It doesn't leave any residue, and dries nice and clean while leaving my dogs' skin conditioned. A must have in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Greg A.

customer_reviews.title: Love IT
customer_reviews.text: We have a dog who rolls in anything and everything. We live in a rural area. and so when I take her running she can roll in deer hides or carcasses, dead bird and rabbit, cow dung, horse dung etc.. This stuff makes it so that we don't have to constantly give her baths.. It does a great job of cleaning her up and making the odor disappear.
customer_reviews.author: mammamenna

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff for keeping my dogs smelling sweet in ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff for keeping my dogs smelling sweet in the winter when it is to cold for regular baths! I use it with a microfiber car wash mitt, it conditions the coat and leaves it smelling and looking clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Sole Sister

customer_reviews.title: ... up in urine off my dogs hind corriders very easy.
customer_reviews.text: This makes cleaning up in urine off my dogs hind corriders very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: My Westie wasn't any cleaaner
customer_reviews.text: Didnt help with the "doggie odor" or make his white coat clean again.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Use on GSD
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Use on GSD. He does not mind. Easy to apply. Nice product keeping the boy GSD smelling pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: M. Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Really helps odor.
customer_reviews.text: Have lab puupy that likes to go to wet smelly areas and roll. Really helps to clean him up with old towels.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We use this on our Rottweiler, he's huge and this is great to use between baths. Smells great and works great.
customer_reviews.author: L.B.

customer_reviews.title: Helps with stinky dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. Does not cause itching in my dogs. Good for quick touch-ups on stinky doggies.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Turner

customer_reviews.title: Buying more
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use- just spray on. Nice smell- not perfumy or overpowering. I like it so much I'm buying more.
customer_reviews.author: mikcynjr

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like it about as much as a bath
customer_reviews.text: Dogs like it about as much as a bath, but a least it's easy and no water involved. Great for that indoor stinky dog.
customer_reviews.author: greg w.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for washing the dog between baths. Smells good too!
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Smells good. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well on my Lab. My only concern when purchasing it was if it would leave a residue that might attract dirt and stain carpets, but it does not appear to. Smells good. Easy to use. Good for between infrequent Lab baths and after a night stay at the kennel.
customer_reviews.author: James Morse

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Waterless Dog Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Would recommed this to anyone, have used it for years. Just recently our puppy decided to go in her kennel and lay in it, cleaned her up with the waterless shampoo, she smelled great and didn't have to do the whole bath time. Is wonderful to have when you travel in case of any kind of accident and clean up. Takes just a few minutes and you are done and they are clean and dry.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Best yet
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several different dry baths and this works better than any of them. It actually lathers up and after a good brushing, my dog looked and smelled great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning for dogs that don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: This does work. You spray it on, lather, then wipe it off. No water. The dog doesn't mind but smells very clean.
customer_reviews.author: Barinr

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product if you are unable to bathe a large dog. Prompt service.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLongTimeCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Not half bad
customer_reviews.text: Does freshen up the dog. Not as good as a real water bath, but certainly better than not doing anything. Not a miracle coat spray, but really, what would be?
customer_reviews.author: Long

customer_reviews.title: so good. My pup smells like a hair salon after
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. My pup smells like a hair salon after, but it's a nice scent and doesn't linger. Clean!
customer_reviews.author: scrumdiddlyumptious

customer_reviews.title: Beats washing your dog in the sink or tub
customer_reviews.text: a good friend with a lot more animal experience than me and with a long haired dog suggested that I would find it effective and much easier to use, especially in the colder months and when travelling... She was exactly right. I have a short haired beagle/Italian greyhound mix who enjoys rolling in grass and enjoying the diverse odors that dogs find aromatically attractive. This product makes it a snap to clean her up, quickly and with no messy clean-up!
customer_reviews.author: Publius

customer_reviews.title: Meh it's ok.
customer_reviews.text: Crazy dog is so much better in my opinion. This was pretty watery.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzly Bear

customer_reviews.title: Works well, especially in winter!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a "wash the dog outside" kind of person, mostly because my dog sheds a LOT (I don't like to think of the havoc her hair would wreak on our drains), and because she's constantly trying to escape the bathtub. So, cold weather poses kind of a problem. I tend to use baking soda when brushing to eliminate odors, but sometimes, you just have to clean the dog! This foots the bill. I can do it indoors comfortably. She's not a fan of being wet, but tolerates this FAR better than the garden hose in warm weather. And the smell is quite pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: great service have purchased before would purchase here again in the future produce works very well for keeps dog clean between grooming
customer_reviews.author: Benna

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful & gentle product
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior dog with limited mobility & joint pain. This shampoo allowed him to be bathed with minimum discomfort, while leaving his coat shiny and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet Jones, PM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Works fabulously! Great smell..long lasting freshness to my Saint! Great for in-between wet baths. great for cold weather whipe downs
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sally A. Kerbo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great smelling, and easy to use! - Wonderful large size!
customer_reviews.author: Kengrove

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the smell of this stuff, and it's a nice size bottle of it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lusk

customer_reviews.title: No more stinky dogs!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and helps keep my dogs smelling fresh between regular shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: K. W. Holler

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: it does what it says hip hip hooray! Our Shih Tzu has runny eyes and this product is keeping him clean and smelling fresh between groomings. It's easy to use and he seems not to mind having his face washed with his wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Freeway

customer_reviews.title: very satisfy
customer_reviews.text: I used it about two months; smells fine and really soften the hair. Only thing is my corgi doesn't like spray on her, she was barking at it and run and run; so i have to spray on the tower and then clean her. She is find with this way. Overall it is good!
customer_reviews.author: JENNY

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it is a life saver between baths
customer_reviews.author: Linda.W.

customer_reviews.title: really seems to work
customer_reviews.text: Best waterless shampoo I have found. Seems to eat odor not just mask it..
customer_reviews.author: G. Gould

customer_reviews.title: Works well on our great danes!
customer_reviews.text: This works well. Too cold to bathe the puppies, so this will help us keep them smelling good until the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Deaner

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My dog likes it & so do his people. Easy to use & smells great too. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Ann Holland

customer_reviews.title: easy and effective  dog shampoo
customer_reviews.text: i found this shampoo several years ago and wouldn't want to be without it. you will love the smell and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Great for small messes
customer_reviews.text: Use this at my vet clinic! Great for small messes.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Walker

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: perfect for after we take our pup to the dog park, we dont want to bathe him 3 times a week, it is bad for his skin, so this is great for inbetween!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't help with the dog smell as much as I hoped and certainly not a substitute for a bath.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel C Stroupe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only product that actually made my dog's hair grow! It is a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps somewhat
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a good intermediate cleaning between baths. it's almost as labor intensive as giving my docile dog a bath, and it doesn't provide nearly the level of cleanliness. It helps, but I just don't think it's enough benefit to outweigh the labor required.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Good smelling dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could give my dog a bath in the winter. Very good smelling and makes the dogs coat very soft.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dungan

customer_reviews.title: Good touch up cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our older dog when it became too hard and stressful for her to go to the groomer. Sadly I only got to use it twice before we had to put her down, but at least she smelled fresh. I still have almost a full bottle of the wash and the conditioner that I will see if some of the neighbors with dogs might want to use up. Overall, it was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amz Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs really enjoy it more than a bath
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are a nightmare to bathe, So I found out there was water-less shampoos and I found Miracle coat, and they really enjoy, that I don't have to chase hem down and carry them into the bathtub. The price is right too.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. I haven't had any issues with dryness on my dogs after using it. I have 2 Great Danes so it is nice to have aproduct like this that works well.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a rescue German shepherd, and she is terrified of water. Will not tolerate a bath. But she loves to have me spray this stuff on her and give her a massage with a rubber fingered brush. then towel her dry and give her some treats, and she is a happy camper. I used to buy this at the pet store, but the Amazon price is like one fourth of what I was paying.
customer_reviews.author: The Erstwhile Photographer

customer_reviews.title: Very good waterless dog shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Either my nose isn't working or this has no scent at all. It is the type of waterless shampoo that I like. You spray it on then rub it all around till it foams then rub the dog down with a towel and brush. I have some smell goodie stuff that I spray on afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Stinks - literally
customer_reviews.text: OMG this product has the most sickening stinky perfume smell. I thought that since the ingredients looked natural it would have a light herbal, spicey scent. I used it once and I won't use it again. The stuff gave me a headache, permeates the house and has a heavy cheap perfume odor.
customer_reviews.author: Love OOB

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my dog is impossible to give a bath to. Although the scent is nice, it leaves my dog's coat very oily and flaky.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Le' Pew!
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance was NOT pleasant at all! Now I know why they call this toilet water....Return process complicated by having opened the bottle to smell the fragrance-now they say its used-duh!! ----my loss ) :
customer_reviews.author: Wont Be Ms. Led

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: smell could be better and last longer. but it cleans!
customer_reviews.author: KIMMY

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work, just wish it smelled better!
customer_reviews.text: Smells like the vets office, but it seems to work. In between baths at least. Don't try to use it if your dog is dirtier than usual.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.

customer_reviews.title: miracle coat spray waterless dog shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my older dog who was unable to be bathed the last year of his life. It cleaned and freshened him up. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Rab

customer_reviews.title: When the pups poop at the wrong time
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product to come to the recue when our show pups poop or pee right before or in the show ring or out on the town. This is the large size which I found at Amazon.com and cannot find in the store. I then put a small amount in a smaller dispenser for my grooming bag.
customer_reviews.author: jillbryna

product_meta.title: Miracle Coat Spray on Waterless Dog Shampoo, 32-Ounce
product_meta.description: Miracle Coat's Spray-on waterless shampoo requires no rinsing - simply spray on, massage into a lather, towel dry and brush out. Consider trying Miracle Coat's unique Conditioner and Leave-in Lusterizing Spray. Keeps the coat untangled - even between baths
feature_bullets: Offers easy bathing for pets with noiseless sprayer.
Natural, pharmaceutical grade ingredients provide solutions to enrich the natural qualities of individual coat types
MiracleCoat, the creator of rinseless solutions blends convenience with care for concerned pet owners
World's finest shampoo products formulated care solutions for dogs
